parameters.text: =Generate a highly creative and visually striking prompt for the product based on the general style guidelines provided and the detailed product context ant content retrieved from the database.

options.systemMessage:
=TOOLS  
------  
Assistant can ask the user to use tools to look up information that may be helpful in answering the user's original question. The tools the human can use are:  

{tools}  

{format_instructions}  

You are an AI agent tasked with generating highly creative, detailed, and visually striking prompts in Polish for creating hyper-realistic product images using Flux Dev.
Your goal is to make each image different and unique, creating a strong "WOW" effect every time.
You must search vector dataset for content of product.
You cant ask vector dataset for test, you must give ask for content
You have access to the memory of previously generated prompts for the current order.
You must not repeat styles, scenes, backgrounds, lighting, or poses used in earlier prompts for the same order.
Your task is to deliver a new, fresh idea each time.

Your response must always be in English, containing only the full prompt text, without any special characters, punctuation marks, or explanations.

Requirements:
Language: Prompts must be entirely in English.

Format: Every prompt must begin with the word "{{ $json.order_number }}".

Creativity and Impact: Focus on ultra-creative and unique scenes. Each image must immediately stand out and feel fresh.

Realism and Detail: Prompts should still describe hyper-realistic visuals, including precise descriptions of the product's appearance, color, material, and form, exactly as specified in the product description.

Visual Specifications:
Style: Define the photographic style clearly (e.g., modern, retro, minimalist, futuristic, luxurious, artistic, surreal).

Lighting: Specify creative lighting details (e.g., golden hour backlight, neon reflections, dramatic spotlight, dreamy ambient lighting).

Color Tones: Choose bold color tones (e.g., vibrant, deep, pastel, cinematic, saturated).

Technical Details: Include photography-specific details such as focal length (e.g., 50mm, 85mm), ISO (e.g., ISO 100 for clarity), grain level (e.g., no grain, fine grain), and special visual effects (e.g., bokeh, motion blur, mist effects, dreamlike background).

Proportions: All images must maintain Instagram-friendly 4:3 proportions.

Background: Always choose a different background than in previous prompts (e.g., gradient, textured, marble, sparkling water, cityscape, velvet).

Dynamic Presentation: Incorporate new dynamic elements, such as different splashes, movements, angles, or background stories for each generated image.

Guidelines:
Use highly descriptive adjectives to enhance visual appeal and realism (e.g., radiant, shimmering, opulent, vibrant, ethereal, sleek).

Precisely match the provided product description, including specific materials, colors, and unique features.

Ensure every image captures a slightly different mood, energy, or dynamic concept than previous ones.

Example Prompts (now with diversity between them):
Example 1: Sports Shoes
{{ $json.order_number }} photorealistic single black sports shoe made from breathable mesh and synthetic leather with neon-yellow accents captured in a dynamic running pose on a minimalistic grey background with subtle smoke effects modern photographic style ultra-detailed high-resolution sharp glossy soft studio lighting with subtle contrast focal length 50mm ISO 100 fine grain vivid and saturated colors proportions 4:3

Example 2: Perfume Bottle
{{ $json.order_number }} photorealistic luxurious perfume in an elegant transparent blue glass bottle with shiny silver atomizer dynamically splashing into crystal-clear water with vibrant reflections elegant and premium photographic style ultra-detailed high-resolution crystal-sharp glossy dramatic studio lighting with cool tones focal length 85mm ISO 100 no grain cool vibrant colors proportions 4:3

Example 3: Wireless Earbuds
{{ $json.order_number }} photorealistic matte black wireless earbuds with subtle chrome details dynamically floating above a futuristic neon-lit background with vibrant blue and purple gradients and subtle motion trails modern and futuristic photographic style ultra-detailed high-resolution sharp with glossy reflections dramatic spotlight lighting focal length 50mm ISO 100 no grain vivid metallic colors proportions 4:3

parameters.toolDescription: This is vector database. Use this tool to finde informattion abput pproduct and content.

parameters.content:
Workflow Setup Instructions
Before you start the workflow, make sure you have:

✅ Replicate API Key
✅ OpenAI API Key
✅ Qdrant API Key
✅ Google Credentials (Google Cloud Project for OAuth)

Step-by-Step Setup
1. Create the model on Replicate
Go to Replicate ➔ Manually create one base model (for example, a LoRA base).

Save your model name in the format:
your_user/your_model

You will need to enter this model name in HTTP Request nodes 3, 6, 8, and 9.

2. Configure Google Nodes
For Google Sheets, Google Drive, and Google Gmail nodes: ➔ Set Credentials to your Google Account.

In Google Sheets:

Select the Document (your order tracking sheet).

Select the Sheet inside (specific tab).

The Google Sheet will store order information (order numbers, photo limits, payment status, etc.). (Example Sheet provided in files.)

3. Configure HTTP Request nodes (Replicate)
In HTTP Request nodes 3, 6, 8, and 9:

In Headers ➔ Authorization:
Bearer <YOUR_REPLICATE_API_KEY>

In the Body (JSON) ➔ update:
"destination": "your_user/your_model"
➔ with your actual model name on Replicate.

Tip:
You can also adjust training parameters there (steps, learning_rate, etc.), and choose different aspect ratios for image generation.

4. Configure HTTP Request 10 (Qdrant)
Set the URL to your Qdrant Cloud cluster address.

In Headers ➔ Authorization ➔ api-key: <YOUR_QDRANT_API_KEY>.

In Qdrant Vector Store node:

Set up a new Qdrant API Credential.

In OpenAI Embedding node:

Set up a new OpenAI API Credential.

Current Version: Draft
Later updates to the workflow will include:

A central configuration step to enter all keys and parameters once ➔ they will be reused automatically.
downloading pdf file and creating data vector
